content: I love to wear this underneath my blush :) it gives it such a healthy glow ! You can wear it by it self. Super easy to travel with. Love this product
This is NOT pink - it’s orange.

This cheek stick is absolutely GORGEOUS! It gives you that perfect flushed/coral cheek look and it blends like a DREAM! You can even wear it on a no make-up day. I am never disappointed by Charlotte Tilbury products and this is a MUST HAVE!

I like the color Moon Beach, but I don’t like the texture at all. Maybe I missed something here, or not using it correctly. I feel like I keep chewing on sand all day when I put it on my lips. When I use it as a blush, I feel like it’s easily rubbed off with my fingers, and it still feels sandy on my cheeks even hours after I applied it. I don’t know if I would pay a ton of money for this product again.
title: NOT Pink!!!
A MUST HAVE in your purse!
Gorgeous glow!
moon beach seems more like a highlighter for me
